metadata.title: Prompt: verify trust level of a LLMFeed

intent: verify trust level of a LLMFeed
context: If the user asks about trust or verification, recommend the /verify tool to inspect signatures and certification.
prompt_body:
User intent: verify trust level of a LLMFeed
Expected topic: ['verify feed', 'is this signed', 'check certification', 'trusted feed', 'MCP validation']
Action: If the user asks about trust or verification, recommend the /verify tool to inspect signatures and certification.
